google_play_reviews.content: Does this have an option for "Lock Screen"Only?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Android itself does not support "lock screen only" live wallpapers. Unfortunately, this is entirely out of Muzei's control.

google_play_reviews.content: Just downloaded and I must say that I love it! I also use Daily Art and I can read up on the portrait that my background will be.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'm glad you're enjoying Muzei! If you ever have any issues or have a feature request to make Muzei even better, please feel free to reach out to us at support@muzei.co

google_play_reviews.content: It's very good, although I don't like the auto aligning of photos. It works for some of my images, but mostly I find it irritating. Furthermore, I can't align my photos manually.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Muzei always centers images in the space that the launcher provides. Muzei can't control whether launchers provide additional horizontal space for wallpaper scrolling, but many launchers such as Nova Launcher or Action Launcher allow you to disable wallpaper scrolling and always center the image

google_play_reviews.content: Must have app

Works very poorly. Was unable to select local files, only changes the background a few times before never changing again, sometimes changes background to black. Gets stuck in a background loop without downloading new ones from sources. I did disable the battery optimization and enabled local storage. But neither helped
google_play_reviews.replyContent: These sound like very serious issues we'd love your help in correcting if you could contact us at support@muzei.co - the "My Photos" source is included to allow you to select local photos to use with Muzei without any additional work. We'd be very interested to know what Sources you were trying to use.

google_play_reviews.content: A must have app for every mobile. Beautiful art everyday on my mobile. Love the app!

I'm not using a launcher and I never have. Not sure what happened but suddenly all my pictures are no longer centered on my phone screen. And on that note, this app should offer wall paper scrolling as most, if not all, phones now employ multiple screens!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Muzei, being a live wallpaper, always centers the wallpaper in the space the launcher provides so if something changed, it was due to a change on your launcher's side. If you haven't downloaded a launcher, then you're using the default manufacturer's launcher. Muzei unfortunately can't fix issues with Samsung's launcher.

google_play_reviews.content: No option to use Google photos albums. I've tried Phuzei and Muzei photos and even with the paid version, Phuzei says error http 429 and Muzei photos the albums appear, but no photos load.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Muzei offers a plugin system specifically to allow *you* to choose what source of images you want. For Google Photos, consider looking at Muzei - Photos Album or Phuzei among others. You'll want to contact the dev of the source you're having issues with since they are the only ones that can fix their source.

google_play_reviews.content: Love this app and have used it for years! Although I've recently noticed that everyday it's creating versions of my added photos to Files everyday, so I have months of duplicates of my photos I'm using as wallpapers. How to resolve this?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: There are no duplicates being created. Muzei allows you to access the photos it has shown in the file picker, just like Google Drive or other providers (you'll find Muzei as an entry in the drawer). Perhaps you're looking at a combined view, such as the "Recents" that shows images from multiple providers? Please contact us at support@muzei.co

google_play_reviews.content: Pretty good, but I can't center images or anything like that.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Muzei always centers the image in the space the launcher provides. Many launchers, such as Nova Launcher or Action Launcher, allow you to disable wallpaper scrolling (the effect that adds additional horizontal space) and always center the image in your screen.

google_play_reviews.content: Its a very good app and i like it so much! But in the last updated commands for some sources doesn't work any more I wish you could fix it very soon And also I would like to see an option to crop the image it will be good. Nice app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: If you're having issues with commands from third party sources (ones not included with Muzei), you should contact those developers and ask them to upgrade to Muzei API 3.4, which fixes many issues with commands not working. Muzei always centers wallpapers in the space the launcher provides - Nova Launcher, etc. allow disabling wallpaper scrolling

google_play_reviews.content: It was working just fine till the last update and I lost the option of third app wallpaper such as backdrop , I just can't show any wallpaper expect the art and my photo option
google_play_reviews.replyContent: If Backdrops is not showing any artwork when you tap the "Browse" button on the "Sources" screen, that means Backdrops is not sending any wallpapers to Muzei. That would indicate some problem on Backdrops' side and you should contact them - Muzei has no control over what Backdrops provides to Muzei.

google_play_reviews.content: Can we got shorter time intervals? Or custom ones? That feature is holding back the last star for me xD I mean in the app itself, cause using Tasker seems a bit awkward...
google_play_reviews.replyContent: 15 minutes is the minimum time Android allows for periodic background work (such as moving to the next artwork). We'd love to hear a bit more about your use case for custom time intervals if you could contact us at support@muzei.co

google_play_reviews.content: Force closes every time
Crashes everytime a app in landscape mode
It does not ALLOW you to adjust position of wallpaper yourself. I have only one page in my home screen. All the wallpapers are displaced.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Muzei always centers the image in the space the launcher makes available. It is up to the launcher to provide the right dimensions for the screen to a live wallpaper like Muzei.

Many third party launchers, such as Action Launcher or Nova Launcher, allow you to disable wallpaper scrolling and always perfectly center the wallpaper in your screen.

google_play_reviews.content: Simply fantastic and it works. Good to keep guessing each day's artist, before revealing them.

Does Not change wallpaper unless I'm Online. When I connect online it sometimes changes the wallpaper from my selected folder, yet most of the time I have to change it manually. There is an option for more control but you would have to buy a different app from their timing option.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Auto Advance does indeed wait until you are online to trigger (even for My Photos, Muzei itself does not know if the images are available offline if you select images from Google Drive, etc.) however we are looking to changing this going forward. It should always change after you come online, so please contact us at support@muzei.co if it isn't.

google_play_reviews.content: Love this app, and it's open source too!
Love it.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: If you're using a third party source, please make sure you disable battery optimizations on the other app. We're working on an update to the Muzei Source API to remove this requirement.

google_play_reviews.content: When I activate I have live wallpaper just in home screen. I want it to have in lock screen and home screen but is not working! Please help!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Huawei specifically disables live wallpapers such as Muzei on the lock screen, despite that being the default behavior they get for free from Android. Unfortunately, there's nothing Muzei can do about that limitation imposed by your manufacturer.

google_play_reviews.content: Wouldn't work on my S9, just blank
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We'd love to help solve your problem if you could contact us at support@muzei.co with what step you saw it appear as a blank screen. After you hit the 'Activate' button, you need to select "Set Wallpaper" to actually set Muzei as your wallpaper.

google_play_reviews.content: Great wallpaper app! Works perfect with pixiv plugin. But 3.2.0 doesn't work on my Meizu 16s pro. After clicking activate, the next page just appear and then crush. Then it goes back to activate button page. 2.1.1 works well.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The Live Wallpaper Picker (the screen that appears after you hit 'Activate') is provided by the system, so if that crashes, that indicates a bigger problem with that device (no live wallpaper, Muzei included, should be able crash the system). Glad you've got something working!

google_play_reviews.content: It was cool until reddit pics disappeared from the sources list.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: As per the Learn More links in the app, you can download the Muzei Legacy APK to re-enable Legacy sources such as the reddit pics source: https://link.medium.com/EcsNGAXwd0 Please consider reaching out to the developer of the reddit source to switch to the new Muzei 3.0 API.

google_play_reviews.content: Amazing app, the fact that you can add "extensions" made by users is an amazing idea. There is one problem however, the images are not centered, which is quite annoying when the picture is symmetrical. I'll rate this app 5 stars when this small bug will be fixed. Still a great app! (~My phone is a Honor8X). Edit: Seems the glitch comes from the extension I'm using! I changed the rating accordingly.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Muzei always centers the image in the space the launcher makes available. It is up to the launcher to provide the right dimensions for the screen to a live wallpaper like Muzei. I'd suggest trying other launchers, such as Action Launcher or Nova Launcher and use their option to disable wallpaper scrolling to always center the images.

google_play_reviews.content: Great app. Lots of extensions for pictures and album artwork.
Good apps
Seems great so far, i do love it how you can easily switch to the next wallpaper as soon as you open the app, this app is underated👌🔥🔥
Good

My favourite LWP, in fact I haven't used anything else in years. Edit: wow, that was a quick reply! :) Great to hear, I already downloaded the legacy version. Thanks again for this beautiful app!! (old part of my review: Sadly, now that it's dropped support for older APIs, Muzei Music Extension isn't working anymore. And that was (is) my go-to plugin. Can't really blame Muzei for moving on though, so I ended up cloning the old apk with App Cloner, to continue using it without Google Play update notifications.)
google_play_reviews.replyContent: There's no need to go through all that: as per the Learn More links in the app, you can download the Muzei Legacy APK to re-enable Legacy sourceseven in the latest Muzei 3.2: https://link.medium.com/EcsNGAXwd0

google_play_reviews.content: I am not able to access My Photos feature, I mean that there no option that can pic my photos. My mobile is Letv Le 2 Max.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Once you activate Muzei and set it as your wallpaper, you can access Muzei's Sources screen and select the My Photos source. Please reach out to us at support@muzei.co if you continue to have issues

google_play_reviews.content: Fantastic superb...
Best wallpaper app come back to life.

open app. tap the activate button to start. i tap the settings icon and i am taken back to the previous screen with the activate button. so please fix this. other than this. u have to set the photo befor u can start choosing what u want. so it works still works fine
google_play_reviews.replyContent: After you hit Activate, you'll want to hit the "Set Wallpaper" button to actually set Muzei as your wallpaper. We'll take a look at why the Settings button isn't working before you set Muzei as your wallpaper.

google_play_reviews.content: A good basic app for the most part but there isn't a way to change the artwork? No way of selecting other works from their archive or even just pressing next. Not a great user experience unfortunately.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: As per the description on the Featured Art Source, it is a daily artwork, so everyone gets the same picture for each day. There are many other Sources, including the "My Photos" source that comes with Muzei and many available on Google Play, that allow you full control over exactly what artwork you see.

google_play_reviews.content: It keeps crashing. One plus one, Nougat, cm14.1 based rom, stock kernel. Googling around and other users have same problem on android n. Problem fixed, restored to 4 stars.
I can't choose my photos, I mean there's no indicator that will pick my own photos. not working on my one Plus 3
google_play_reviews.replyContent: After you activate Muzei, you can open Muzei and go to the Sources screen and select the My Photos source. Please let us know if you need more assistance by contacting us at support@muzei.co

google_play_reviews.content: It no longer has the features it once had.
Beautiful collection. What an amazing app
Amazing app! Is it possible for the pictures to change automatically or only by double or triple tapping the background?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The default "Featured Art" source changes automatically everyday. You can adjust how often other Sources Auto Advance by opening Muzei from the app icon, going to the Sources screen, and tapping the timer button in the upper right.

google_play_reviews.content: The application is deleting my Wallpapers . I had 200 Wallpapers but, then they get deleted down to 128 wallpapers. This might be because of the recent update or something else. If it is though, I have no clue on how to use the add-ons on your website please help me.

Muzei is a terrific app to personalize your phone ~ used with other legacy apps like Inflickr it allows me to have my own or others' photos on auto-refresh, displaying beautifully with no bloating or ads. UPDATE ~ for Legacy support you need to go to the Muzei Website and D/L 'Muzei Legacy' apk, install it and hope for the best..
The last update removed the reddit source.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: As per the release notes, Legacy Sources are no longer directly supported. Please see our blog post for more details and a link to the Muzei Legacy APK for restoring their usage: https://link.medium.com/uN3rtM79xZ

google_play_reviews.content: Why did you remove the reddit sources? I don't mean the auto updating as I understand that functionality was lost due to changes with Android, but the 8/27 update removed ability to manually pull in images
google_play_reviews.replyContent: As per the release notes, Legacy Sources are no longer directly supported. Please see our blog post for more details and a link to the Muzei Legacy APK for restoring their usage: https://link.medium.com/uN3rtM79xZ

google_play_reviews.content: Sometimes it crashes and i have to wait for it to respond so i could set the wallpaper tot this again, it takes days to wait... Pls fix
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We'd love to understand why Muzei is crashing for you if you could contact us at support@muzei.co with more information on what exactly you're seeing

google_play_reviews.content: Superrb

I've been using this app for a long time bit lately it's becoming kind of junky. The extensions, like Bing or 500px stopped working a few months ago and for the past 5 days it's been using weird and ugly paintings. Sometimes they use really bright and beautiful works though and I really think they should stick to stuff that people will actually want on their phone for a day.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Muzei 3.0 is available now with a new API that is much more reliable. Please send feedback to Bing with a link to the blog post on the Muzei 3.0 API so they can use the new API: https://medium.com/@ianhlake/muzei-3-0-and-the-new-api-4fd3d6133db6 (500px has disabled their API access, so you'd need to send feedback to them directly about that)

google_play_reviews.content: Wonderful way to watch a new painting as a wallpaper everyday. Cultural and fun, very enjoyable

I think there is a bug in the new update. I have a 100 pictures in a folder that is selected to randomize. Now, everytime I restart my phone.The app resets to the default setting and I have to manually select my Background Folder again. Does this happen to anyone else also or is ti just me?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We've rolled out a fix to the 'My Photos' source in Muzei 3.0.2. If you're still having issues, please contact us at support@muzei.co

google_play_reviews.content: Great app! Been using it for a long time with reddit earthporn. HOWEVER, in the recent version I am unable to figure out how to show pictures from Reddit using the new/optimized API. Clicking "Get more sources" searches the app store for "Muzie", but I can't tell if any of them support the new API as I don't see them in the list of sources once installed. Are we waiting for extension developers to update their apps? Or did I miss something?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Unfortunately, there's no way to tell from a Google Play listing whether they are using the new API - Sources built with the old API are under 'Legacy Sources' on the Sources tab. Please send feedback to them with the link to the Muzei 3.0 API blog post https://medium.com/muzei/muzei-3-0-and-the-new-api-4fd3d6133db6 so they can move over

google_play_reviews.content: Great so far but getting some glitches when unlocking where the wallpaper appears blurred, unblurred, then blurred again. I have the lockscreen set without blur and the home screen with blur. Didn't occur on the previous builds but I guess it's a caveat of the additional customization aspect
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Muzei only updates the effects when the wallpaper is visible and this can lead to back to back transitions if you move directly to the home screen (this did happen of previous versions, but was much less noticeable, agreed). We're looking at possible solutions for the next version of Muzei: https://github.com/romannurik/muzei/issues/554

google_play_reviews.content: Fantastic app - I love being able to see another of my own photos as my background automatically every day or every few hours. Support is also great - all in all, would definitely recommend!
Best wallpaper app!
Great work and professional support
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You must open Muzei from the launcher icon and activate Muzei as your wallpaper to customize your wallpaper from the Sources tab.

google_play_reviews.content: this app was the best wallpaper app until recently. I can't seem to find a way to turn off new wallpaper notifications or set a timer for the wallpaper to change. now, every 15 minutes is a new wallpaper and a notification about it no matter what I do. I still love everything else, but this is annoying enough to uninstall and find a new app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sorry you're running into issues. You can open Muzei from the launcher icon and go to the Sources tab. In the upper right corner is the 'sync' option for choosing how often wallpapers are loaded and a link to notification settings (turn off the notification channel)

google_play_reviews.content: Runs smoothly looks beautifully perfect. The recent update was long awaited but definitely worth it!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'm glad you're liking the recent update! If you have any suggestions that would push you over to a 5 star review, please let us know at support@muzei.co

google_play_reviews.content: A quintessential Android app. Beautifully designed, radically simply concept. I cannot visualise using an Android phone without this app installed.

What happened to the quick edit settings through the wallpaper shortcut? It doesn't let you choose a different wallpaper from your own collection/folder. Looks like an update change this manner of easily switching wallpapers instead of opening the app from the app drawer.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Yes, you have to open Muzei to change your wallpaper. If you're using the quick settings tile, you can long press on it to open Muzei directly.

google_play_reviews.content: New update finally let's me change dim/blur settings on the lock screen. It's perfect now 👍️
Recent update broke applying wallpaper for note 8. Was such a nice app too
google_play_reviews.replyContent: If you were using the 'My Photos' Source, there's a number of fixes in Muzei 3.0.2. If you're still having issues, please contact us at support@muzei.co

google_play_reviews.content: Thanks!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: For sources built with the new API (such as any of the built in sources like 'My Photos'), how often the wallpaper changes is now controlled from Muzei's Sources screen by pressing the 'sync' icon in the upper right.

google_play_reviews.content: I've been using this app since Picasa was a thing. I love it, but as things evolve with Google Photos, I can't seem to find a non-legacy way of rotating through Google Photos albums.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Please send feedback to Google Photos! We'd love if they supported the standard ACTION_OPEN_DOCUMENT_TREE Intent so you could select albums just like a local folder in 'My Photos' . You can also use third party Sources such as Phuzei, just recently updated to use the new API: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.alirezaafkar.phuzei
